about_the_game:
1.GE_SFA_Come_on_my_boy(DLC_Limited_Edition)

Gigante soundtrack "Come on my Boy" of GE, re-arranged in a modern vibe, will visit you new but familiar as a limited OST only presented to you by DLC and YouTube #GEOST

[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_SFA_Come_on_my_boy(DLC_Limited_Edition)

ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A

: Sevin (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by Coca

ㆍVocals by Lee Jung Hee

ㆍSynth Programming : Coca

ㆍMixing by S.F.A

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.





2.GE_Initium_Epic_Epidemic

The first track of the Naurht Vernier, a piece of intense orchestral music allowing you to experience the tragic beauty and the tension behind all #GEOST

[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_Initium_Epic_Epidemic

ㆍMusic Produced by Initium

: KevinM (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by Initium

ㆍKeys & Programming : KevinM

ㆍSynth Programming : Hong Sung Kyu

ㆍMixing by Initium

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.







3.GE_SFA_Don't_live_in_the_Cave

The first track of the Truman Underground Fortress, a trendy trance inviting you to the nostalgia of the early Granado Espada #GEOST


[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_SFA_Don't_live_in_the_Cave

ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A

: Coca (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by S.F.A

ㆍSynth Programming : Coca

ㆍMixing by S.F.A

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.




4.GE_Initium_Rush_Hour

A chilling guitar groove ready to blow away the frustration of morning traffic #GEOST

[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_Initium_Rush_Hour

ㆍMusic Produced by Initium

: KevinM (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by Initium


ㆍGuitar : Cho Sung Jun

ㆍKeys & Programming : KevinM
ㆍMixing by Initium

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.





5.GE_Initium_Jewel_Land

Slipping beyond the grasp, the fear and tension from a clue yet to be solved #GEOST

[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_Initium_Jewel_Land

ㆍMusic Produced by Initium

: KevinM (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by Initium

ㆍKeys & Programming : KevinM

ㆍSynth Programming : Hong Sung Kyu

ㆍMixing by Initium

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.



6.GE_SFA_HIgh_Class

The track originally made in 2011 that unfortunately couldn't meet the world due to it's rather esoteric(?) composition, finally makes its debut at Truman Underground Fortress #GEOST


[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_SFA_HIgh_Class

ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A

: Sevin (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by S.F.A

ㆍKeys & Programming : Sevin

ㆍMixing by S.F.A

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.





7.GE_SFA_Advance_Toward

What will be awaiting us at the end of the pitch-black tunnel? Suspense builds on as the music continues along with the guitar line #GEOST


[Credit]

ㆍTitle : GE_SFA_Advance_Toward

ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A

: Drogo (Composer)

ㆍ Arranged by S.F.A

ㆍKeys & Programming : Drogo

ㆍGuitar : Drogo

ㆍMixing by S.F.A

ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)

ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

name: Granado Espada Ailis region OST collection

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Granado Espada Ailis region OST collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 266 MB available space

short_description: The soundtrack pre-released by DLC before the update of the New Ailis area of Granado Espada will contain 7 tracks in total. This DLC contains the mp3 music file with 128 rate
